title: Need help ID'ing san serif unicase font
content:
Hello, I’ve been trying to find this certain font, but no luck so far. It is a san-serif unicase font. This is it on these sites:

[On This poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029024232/http:/blog.pelerin.info/patrimoine-en-blog/upload/2008/04/Affiche%20Cedhec%202008%202.jpg)  
(it is the font written as Devenez architecte...

and

[In this site in images](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029024232/http:/www.citechaillot.fr/)

From what I can tell, it is not, Social Gothic, Los Alamos or Gala. Even though it is close.

Thanks for all the help

 [‹ Independent Truck Company](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029024232/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49839 "Go to previous forum topic") [Obama handwritten font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029024232/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49826 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Paradox

comments.content: It looks like a customized DIN.
